CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 20, 1953, page 23, reads: "Booth of Beauty - Among the many attractive booths which were visited at the Courier's Home Service Fair were Best Foods, Inc. whose giant picnic basket was filled with sandwich delights; A & P Food Stores, Phiip Morris Cigarettes, Carmen Murphy's House of Beauty Cosmetics, Trower Tailoring Company and Pepsi-Cola Metropolitan Bottling Company."
TitMainTitle: Best Foods, A & P Food Stores, Philip Morris, House of Beauty, and Pepsi booths, in Ammon Center, for 1953 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
